sense.name: present age
sense.commentary: Timespan including the present that is typically larger than the current twenty four hour period.
sense.examples: The world of today demands tougher hairspray. Today we have computers to facilitate communication with clients.

sense.name: this 24hr day
sense.commentary: The the twenty four hour time period that includes the present
sense.examples: It's a beautiful day, today. Did you see today's paper. No, yesterday doesn't count - today I start my diet.
